item.title: SeGa4Biz
item.description: Modeling supports different levels of abstraction and hence, increases user involvement throughout the development. SeGa4Biz particularly provides metamodels for creating Educational Serious Games (ESG) and Game-Aware Process (GAP) models, and automates considerable parts of the modeling and development activities, via model transformation. This project is indeed the implementation of my paper titled “SeGa4Biz: Model-Driven Framework for Developing Serious Games for Business Processes”. For theoretical information, please refer to the paper.
